scripts.export :db: mkdir -p .export/sql && npm run wp db -- export .export/sql/local.sql
scripts.import: wp-env run cli wp db import sql/db.sql
scripts.start: wp-env start --update && wp-env run cli wp theme activate ukai
scripts.compile:css: rimraf build/css && sass src/css:build/css/ --no-source-map --style expanded && npx postcss build/css/*.css --use autoprefixer -d build/css/
scripts.build: npm run check && npm run compile
